name: Michael STOKES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Stokes v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Michael STOKES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of September, 2015, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alan Matthew Robinson, Jason Anthony Lambrino, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
122 A.3d 1037
Michael STOKES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 29, 2015.
Michael Stokes, Frackville, pro se.
Alan Matthew Robinson, Jason Anthony Lambrino, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
